mapper.update: update user set account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarurl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car = #{car}, cartype = #{cartype}, gl = #{gl}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, account, pwd, nickname, gender, avatarurl, phone, ctime, `type`, `status`, car, cartype, gl from user
select id, account, pwd, nickname, gender, avatarurl, phone, ctime, `type`, `status`, car, cartype, gl from user where account = #{account}
select id, account, pwd, nickname, gender, avatarurl, phone, ctime, `type`, `status`, car, cartype, gl from user where account = #{account} and pwd = #{pwd} and `type` = #{type}
select id, account, pwd, nickname, gender, avatarurl, phone, ctime, `type`, `status`, car, cartype, gl from user where type = #{type} order by ctime desc

select id, account, pwd, nickname, gender, avatarurl, phone, ctime, `type`, `status`, car, cartype, gl from user
account like concat('%',#{key},'%') or nickname like concat('%',#{key},'%')
and type = #{type}
order by ctime desc
